name: combined-project
description: A project to combine lazy loading and minification

scripts.minify: uglifyjs js/script.js -o js/script.min.js && cleancss -o css/styles.min.css css/styles.css && html-minifier-terser --input-dir . --output-dir . --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true --file-ext html
